title: The Lonely Hearts Club is Open for Members!
body:
Are you tired of being alone? Do you need friends? Want to have have a casual game without ragers? Well come on and join the Lonely Hearts Club! 

We want people who: 

- Are Active 
- Have a Microphone and will use it
- Are not ragers 

If you want to join an active community then add Ihaveareallife in game or reply here and I will add you. 

The Lonely Hearts </3

replies.body: ayy someone did it, i added you (name is zac bot) {{champion:154}}
